metadata.title: CVE-2018-16597 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.8. Incorrect accesschecking in overlayfs mounts could be used by local attackers to modify ortruncate files in the underlying filesystem.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16597` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required
